author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Track and display days since the bot last crashed in the bot's About Me section. Features crash history, longest streak tracking, and automatic crash detection.
install_msg: Thank you for installing BorkedSince! Use `[p]borkedsince setbio <text>` to set your base bio, then `[p]borkedsince enable` to start tracking. The cog will automatically detect crashes and update your bot's About Me with 'Last borked: X days ago'.
short: Track days since last bot crash in About Me
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data. It only stores global bot statistics about crashes and uptime.
